mapper.update: update tbl_board set isDeleted = true where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select tb.bno, tb.writer, tb.boardTitle, tb.boardContent, tb.regDate, tb.modDate, concat(tbf.uuid, tbf.fileName) as fileNames from tbl_board tb left outer join tbl_board_file tbf on tb.bno = tbf.bno where tb.isDeleted = false and tb.bno = #{bno}

select tb.bno, tb.boardTitle, tb.boardContent, tb.regDate, tb.modDate, tb.writer, tbf.fileName from tbl_board tb left outer join tbl_board_file tbf on tb.bno = tbf.bno where tb.isDeleted = false and (tbf.ord = 0 or tbf.ord is null)
tb.boardTitle like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
tb.boardContent like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
tb.writer like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by tb.bno desc limit #{skip}, #{size}

select count(*) from ( select tb.bno, tb.boardTitle, tb.boardContent, tb.regDate, tb.modDate, tb.writer, tbf.fileName from tbl_board tb left outer join tbl_board_file tbf on tb.bno = tbf.bno where tb.isDeleted = false and (tbf.ord = 0 or tbf.ord is null)
tb.boardTitle like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
tb.boardContent like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
tb.writer like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
limit #{countEnd}) boardCnt
